model

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The is the Controller class that communicates the view and model.

    • Method Detail

      • registerVehicle

        public boolean registerVehicle(int vehicleType,
                               double basePrice,
                               java.lang.String brand,
                               int model,
                               int cylinderCapacity,
                               double mileage,
                               java.lang.String licensePlate,
                               java.lang.Double pcPrice,
                               java.lang.Integer pcYear,
                               java.lang.Double tmPrice,
                               java.lang.Integer tmYear,
                               java.lang.Double gasEmitted,
                               java.lang.Double soatPrice,
                               java.lang.Integer soatYear,
                               java.lang.Double coverageAmount,
                               int motorcycleType,
                               double gasolineCapacity)
        Method to register a motorcycle.
        Parameters:
        vehicleType - the type of vehicle. New or used.
        basePrice - the base price of the motorcycle.
        brand - the brand of the motorcycle.
        model - the model of the motorcycle.
        cylinderCapacity - the cylinder capacity of the motorcycle.
        mileage - the mileage of the motorcycle. 0 if the motorcycle is new.
        licensePlate - the license plate of the motorcycle. Null if the motorcycle is new.
        pcPrice - price of property card. Null if the motorcycle is new.
        pcYear - year of property card. Null if the motorcycle is new.
        tmPrice - price of the techno mechanical document. Null if the motorcycle is new.
        tmYear - year of the techno mechanical document. Null if the motorcycle is new.
        gasEmitted - gas emitted by the motorcycle. Null if the motorcycle is new.
        soatPrice - price of the SOAT document. Null if the motorcycle is new.
        soatYear - year of the SOAT document. Null if the motorcycle is new.
        coverageAmount - amount of coverage of the SOAT document. Null if the motorcycle is new.
        motorcycleType - the type of motorcycle.
        gasolineCapacity - motorcycle's gasoline capacity
        Returns:
        whether the motorcycle was registered or not.

      • registerVehicle

        public boolean registerVehicle(int vehicleType,
                               double basePrice,
                               java.lang.String brand,
                               int model,
                               int cylinderCapacity,
                               double mileage,
                               java.lang.String licensePlate,
                               java.lang.Double pcPrice,
                               java.lang.Integer pcYear,
                               java.lang.Double tmPrice,
                               java.lang.Integer tmYear,
                               java.lang.Double gasEmitted,
                               java.lang.Double soatPrice,
                               java.lang.Integer soatYear,
                               java.lang.Double coverageAmount,
                               int carType,
                               int doorsNumber,
                               int hasTintedWindows,
                               int gasolineType,
                               double tankCapacity)
        Method to register a gasoline car.
        Parameters:
        vehicleType - the type of vehicle. New or used
        basePrice - base price of the car
        brand - brand of the car
        model - model of the car
        cylinderCapacity - cylinder capacity of the car
        mileage - mileage of the car. 0 if the car is new
        licensePlate - license plate of the car. Null if the vehicle is new
        pcPrice - price of property card. Null if the car is new
        pcYear - year of property card. Null if the car is new
        tmPrice - price of the techno mechanical document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        tmYear - year of the techno mechanical document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        gasEmitted - gas emitted by the car. Null if the vehicle is new.
        soatPrice - price of the SOAT document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        soatYear - year of the SOAT document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        coverageAmount - amount of coverage of the SOAT document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        carType - the type of car. Sedan or SUV
        doorsNumber - doors number of the car.
        hasTintedWindows - whether the car has tinted windows or not.
        gasolineType - the type of car gasoline. Extra, diesel or regular.
        tankCapacity - tank capacity of the car.
        Returns:
        whether the gasoline car was registered or not

                               int batteryLife)
        Method to register a electric car.
        Parameters:
        vehicleType - the type of vehicle. New or used
        basePrice - base price of the car.
        brand - brand of the car.
        model - model of the car.
        cylinderCapacity - cylinder capacity of the car.
        mileage - mileage of the car. 0 if the car is new.
        licensePlate - license plate of the car. Null if the vehicle is new.
        pcPrice - price of property card. Null if the car is new.
        pcYear - year of property card. Null if the car is new.
        tmPrice - price of the techno mechanical document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        tmYear - year of the techno mechanical document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        gasEmitted - gas emitted by the car. Null if the vehicle is new.
        soatPrice - price of the SOAT document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        soatYear - year of the SOAT document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        coverageAmount - amount of coverage of the SOAT document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        carType - the type of car. Sedan or SUV.
        doorsNumber - doors number of the car.
        hasTintedWindows - whether the car has tinted windows or not.
        chargerType - the type of charger. Fast or normal..
        batteryLife - battery life of the car.
        Returns:
        whether the electric car was registered or not.

        basePrice - base price of the car
        brand - brand of the car
        model - model of the car
        cylinderCapacity - cylinder capacity of the car

        tankCapacity - tank capacity of the car.
        chargerType - the type of charger. Fast or normal

      • registerDocuments

        public Document[] registerDocuments(int vehicleType,
                                    java.lang.Double pcPrice,
                                    java.lang.Integer pcYear,
                                    java.lang.Double tmPrice,
                                    java.lang.Integer tmYear,
                                    java.lang.Double gasEmitted,
                                    java.lang.Double soatPrice,
                                    java.lang.Integer soatYear,
                                    java.lang.Double coverageAmount)
        Method to configure the documents of the vehicle
        Parameters:
        vehicleType - the type of vehicle. New or used
        pcPrice - price of property card. Null if the vehicle is new
        pcYear - year of property card. Null if the vehicle is new
        tmPrice - price of the techno mechanical document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        tmYear - year of the techno mechanical document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        gasEmitted - gas emitted by the vehicle. Null if the vehicle is new.
        soatPrice - price of the SOAT document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        soatYear - year of the SOAT document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        coverageAmount - amount of coverage of the SOAT document. Null if the vehicle is new.
        Returns:
        the documents of the vehicle

      • calculateSellingPrice

        public double calculateSellingPrice(java.lang.String id)
        Method to calculate the selling price of a vehicle. It returns -1 if the vehicle is not registered.

      • generateReport

        public java.lang.String generateReport(int option)
        Method to generate reports with all vehicles data. The report can be by type, fuel type or use.
        Parameters:
        option - the option to generate the report. 1 for type, 2 for fuel type and 3 for use.
        Returns:
        the report.

      • generateReportByType

        public java.lang.String generateReportByType()
        Method to generate a report by type. The types are: Motorcycle, GasolineCar, ElectricCar, HybridCar.
        Returns:
        the report by type.

      • generateReportByFuel

        public java.lang.String generateReportByFuel()
        Method to generate a report by fuel type. The fuel types are: Extra, Diesel and Regular.
        Returns:
        the report by fuel type.

      • generateReportByUsage

        public java.lang.String generateReportByUsage()
        Method to generate a report by usage. The report contains information on new and used cars..
        Returns:
        the report by usage.

        public java.lang.String showDocumentStatus(java.lang.String id)
        Method to show the document status of a vehicle.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the document status of the vehicle.

      • findVehicle

        public Vehicle findVehicle(java.lang.String id)
        Method to find a vehicle by id. It returns null if the vehicle is not found.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the vehicle.
        Returns:
        the vehicle.

      • showParkingMap

        public java.lang.String showParkingMap()
        Method to show the parking map.
        Returns:
        the parking map.

      • isOld

        public boolean isOld(Vehicle vehicle)
        Method to validate if the vehicle must be moved to the parking. If the vehicle is used and its model is older than 2015, it must be moved to the parking.
        Parameters:
        vehicle - the vehicle to be validated.
        Returns:
        whether the vehicle must be moved to the parking or not.

      • moveToParking

        public void moveToParking()
        Method to move the vehicles to the parking. It moves the test vehicles to the parking.

      • oldCarsInRange

        public java.lang.String oldCarsInRange(int start,
                                       int end)
        Method to generate a parking report in a time range.
        Parameters:
        start - the start time.
        end - the end time.
        Returns:
        the parking report.
